posts.title: Asian American & Pacific Islander Heritage Reading List: Accessible Versions with BARD & Bookshare Links
posts.text: As part of our celebration of AAPI Heritage Month, our expert librarians have curated a new reading list for adults, kids, and teens with more than 80 titles that spotlight a range of experiences within Asian American and Pacific Islander communities. Most of the books on the list are available in one or more accessible formats.

posts.title: NYPL's Best Books of 2020: Accessible Versions with BARD & Bookshare Links
posts.text: Discover The New York Public Library's Best Books of 2020 for adults, kids, and teens in accessible formats including talking books, braille, and Bookshare editions.

posts.title: NYPL's 2020 Essential Reads on Feminism for Adults: Accessible Version with BARD & Bookshare Links
posts.text: The books on this list illuminate how feminism intersects with race, class, education, and LGBTQ+ activism. Most of these titles are available in one or more accessible formats.
